name: The Catacombs of Venice
description:
Submission for the GameDev.tv 2021 Game Jam!

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-game-jam-2021

'All that glisters isn't gold'.

You play Antonio, thrown into the Catacombs of Venice by Shylock's henchmen. With only a bow and an inexhaustible supply of arrows, hunt for treasure to pay off your pound of flesh.

Description: A simple, fairly casual dungeon-crawler.

Built with: Unity 3D using URP for funky 2d light effects.

Controls: WSAD, mouse to point and shoot

Credits to:
Graphics: The wonderful creators of the Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup tiles
Navmesh2d: https://github.com/h8man/NavMeshPlus/
Sounds: https://freesound.org/
Music: https://freepd.com/misc.php

Special Note:
If you like the game and are interested in further development, please drop me a line and I'll expand it to include proper RPG mechanics, shops, procedural dungeon generation and general roguelike loveliness.
